description: The bands will perform at separate shows at Warwick Castle over a weekend in August.
title: Texas and Pet Shop Boys named as Warwick Castle headliners
title_page: Texas and Pet Shop Boys named as Warwick Castle headliners - BBC News
maintext:
Music superstars Texas and the Pet Shop Boys will headline a pair of shows at Warwick Castle this summer.
As part of Warwick Castle Live, the bands will perform at separate shows over two consecutive days in August.
Scottish rock band Texas will take to the stage on 29 August, before the electronic-pop duo perform a day later.
Both acts will play shows with sets featuring their greatest hits at the historic venue.
